ORIGAM Documentation : Textbox

Created by Rita Vavrdová, last modified by Tomáš Vavrda on Jun 11, 2015

You can use textbox for entering textual or number data. If the data field is a number field, the textbox automatically formats numbers.

Features

  • Single line
  • Multiple lines
  • Rich (HTML) formatting
  • Number formatting

Example

Simple text box:

#TODO_FILE:8617998#

Rich text box:

#TODO_FILE:9404654#
